---

## How to Add to Strapi

1. Go to http://localhost:1337/admin
2. Click "Content Manager" ‚Üí "Industry"
3. Click "Create new entry"
4. Copy and paste each field from above
5. The slug will auto-generate from the title
6. For JSON fields (keyPoints, stats), copy the JSON exactly as shown
7. For gradient, copy the CSS gradient string exactly
8. Click "Save"
9. Click "Publish"
10. Repeat for all 4 industries
